short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the order of videos that are played within any playlist currently playing on a YouTube page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of the videos that play through in a playlist.

If you find yourself recording the names of videos that are being played in a YouTube playlist then this extension will make recording for you easier. This will work regardless, but this is especially helpful when your playlist is on shuffle.

After you click 'Record', the extension keeps track of the YouTube playlist that's active. When you stop the recording you can download the list of videos that played.
